title: What we told UK leaders about climate and nature at a national emergency briefing
description: With so many influential people in the room, the hope was to see a tipping point in the engagement of political, faith, business and cultural leaders.
content: I joined eight other experts to deliver a national emergency briefing in late November on the climate and nature to around 1,200 of the UK’s leaders — across politics, business, faith and culture — i… [+5995 chars]

raw_data.author: Paul Behrens, British Academy Global Professor, Future of Food, Oxford Martin School, University of Oxford
